spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant deviations in room placement and proportions, and incorrect door/window placements. The layout is somewhat recognizable, but many elements are incorrectly scaled or positioned.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing an entire bathroom. Adjacency relationships are mostly incorrect due to the missing bathroom and relocated walls. Wall thickness is inconsistent.

furniture_mapping.notes: Many furniture elements are missing, altered, or incorrectly scaled/placed. The living room sofa is different, and the kitchen appliances are changed. Beds and wardrobes are significantly different.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The isometric camera is mostly correct, and geometry is clean. Lighting is decent. However, the overall visual clarity is impacted by the structural and spatial inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Missing a full bathroom and parts of the kitchen counter/sink layout.
The bathroom next to the left bedroom is completely misplaced/missing. The kitchen area is significantly altered and missing elements.
The door to the bathroom on the left is missing, and the bedroom doors are rotated incorrectly.
Significant proportion distortion in all rooms, especially the left bedroom, the kitchen, and the living room. The hallway next to the living room is also distorted.
A window is hallucinated in the left bedroom. The L-shaped counter in the kitchen is a hallucination. There is also a hallucinated wall section between the kitchen and dining area.
Missing wardrobe from the left bedroom.
Missing two beds and a wardrobe from the left bedroom.
Missing desk from the right bedroom.
Missing multiple kitchen appliances (oven, fridge, part of the counter).
Windows are incorrect in placement and count in all rooms.
The door to the left bedroom is incorrectly placed and missing its swing arc.
The door to the right bedroom is incorrectly placed.
The living room dimensions are noticeably different, appearing much wider in the render.
The kitchen and dining area are proportionally distorted.
The sink and toilet in the generated bathroom are misplaced compared to the floor plan.
The shower unit is missing from the bathroom.
